fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE
Personal Information
Full name:
Nguyễn Quang Phước
Birthday:
June 22
nd, 1984
Nationality: Vietnamese
Gender: Male
Marital status:
Married
Working Experience
Job level:
PHP Team Leader / Web Project Manager
Working experience:
more 10 years
Most recent employer:
NashTech Vietnam – HarveyNash Group
Most recent job title:
Technical Architect
Working Experience:
Senior PHP Developer / Technical Architect -  Freelancer
At home– HCM
06/2019 – current
- 
Get projects and worked as freelancer.
-
Research about WP & NodeJS
Principle Software Engineer -  Fulltime
NashTech Vietnam – HarveyNash Group – HCM
04/2017 – 06/2019
-
Resolve issues and challenges, make connection people and is code 
igniter for members.
-
Worked as a Technical Architect and support solutions for projects.
-
Joined to OpenLearn project with Drupal & Moodle technology. Resolved 
issues existed and help project can be developed more. The project has 
been completed expectation and applied NodeJS & restructure Drupal 
code & JS code (use gulp for improvement FE tasks). Refactor code for 
serious issues and implement some modules. I have worked with high 
stream in 6 months for getting target and must research a lot of solutions. 
This is a challenge project.
-
Develop NashTech websites, HarveyNash US sites,…  with Wordpress 
CMS
-
Azure & AWS hosting are used in almost projects and I have spent much 
time for researching and understand about them. After that, transfer and 
guide developers.
-
Save the HarveyNash Nordics website successful. It has been rebuild with
short time and it is important project for business of company. The project 
is a challenge and complex about business rule for coding. I have taken 
almost roles in the project includes: support and consultant for client, plan 
and estimate requests, monitor and manage the site hosting on AWS, 
develop & delivery features, security testing,… I have worked on it for a 
long time (around more 1.5 years) and worked directly with client in 
Sweden. The WP Multisite CMS has been applied for the project and use 
tools support marketing team.
Web Project Manager / Technical Lead -  Freelancer
EastBayHub – HCM
04/2016 – 04/2017
-
Worked as Offshore Manager and work directly with agencies, can make 
decisions and communicate with client for projects. 
-
Manage web development team, find resources and worked as Project 
Manager. Team members are almost managed remotely by cause of 
different areas.
-
Worked as Software Business Analysis for internal projects.
-
Provide estimation and quotes.
-
Provide solutions about technical.
-
The main technologies: Wordpress CMS, Shopify, HTML/CSS/jQuery, 
Grunt, Gulp, ReactJS.
-
All projects is from US.
-
Worked officially with 8 hrs / day (except weekend) and more for urgent 
cases.
-
Research some new technical.
PHP Developer -  Freelancer
At home– HCM
04/2016 – 04/2017
-
Get projects and worked as freelancer for agencies: Digital Outlook 
(AUS), Smart OSC (VN), Marc Fashion (VN).
-
The working time is flexible and make sure about timeline & deadline.
-
Released JWF Plugin for Wordpress support functions for coding on 
Wordpress. The plugin is included in theme and not publish on Wordpress
network. It just be used for projects and maintained personal through 
bitbucket.
Technical Lead - Fulltime
SmartOSC Corporation – HCM
02/2015 – 04/2016
- Support technical for team
- Manage tasks, timeline, quality of projects.
- Worked on projects about Magento, Wordpress.
- Support to build tools and used for management such as: Jenkins, 
FishEyes,..
PHP Senior Software Engineer - Fulltime
Harvey Nash Vietnam.– HCM
12/2011 – 02/2015
- Work as team leader of sub team.
- Join to Aussie Project and develop a web application to manage
business work of client (called is Toolbox). The website is developed base
on Zend Framework. Toolbox is Aussie’s new online integrated Sales and
Customer Relationship Management (CRM) platform – a single, customer
centric database that allows you to manage all your customer interactions
and prospects in the one system. Toolbox represents a significant
investment by Aussie to deliver a customer centric, market leading sales
tool.
-  Develop Harveynash website: Use Wordpress CMS. The Nashtech VN
website is company website, used for introduces and publishes information
to users. The main features are post jobs and apply online.
-  Develop Nashtech Global Website: Use Wordpress CMS. The Nashtech
Global website is company website, used for introduces and publishes
information to users. This site has built with Wordpress MVC and it is
rebuilt with Wordpress CMS standard. The main feature is create dynamic
structure for input content, admin can add/update/move/delete parts on
sites. Site is supported multilingual.
- Lead BBGV team and develop bbgv.org website. This project is upgrade
from old version 1.5 to version 3.3.3 of Joomla CMS. The migration data is
important request and needs to be resolved correctly. The user friendly is
required when input data.
-  Is member of Training group and success some course for developers
- Interview candidates for PHP positions.
-  Report to team leader and PM.
PHP Team Leader – Freelancer
Pyramid Consulting Vietnam.– HCM
02/2013  – 12/2013
- Lead and provide technical solution for Wordpress projects.
- Work 3-4 hours per day. Work full on Saturday.
- Join to Wordpress Projects:
+ Belga Portal: is multi websites system, multilingual. Administrator can
manage content for all in admin page, connect social network for getting
data. Somewhere on web connect to APIs (java service) for display data
and provide data, use REST method.
      + Belga  Mediaroom: is multi websites system, multilingual. It is used
for magazine system. Administrator can clone, create sub-sites, modify
them and publish to new sites. It support share socials from posting
articles, get data from social networks. Provide APIs for getting from Belga
Plus system (Java system).
     + Louise54: is fashion website. The main method is using ajax.
     + Ken fulk website: is personal website of Ken.
PHP Team Leader - Freelancer
KMS Technology Vietnam.– HCM
12/2011 – 02/2012
- Work at home on every night with 4 hours.
- Develop and consult about technical for developing qasymphony websites.
- The site is developed on Wordpress CMS.
- Report directly to director.
PHP Team Leader - Freelancer
Bliss Interactive.– HCM
11/2011 – 12/2011
- Develop website project for 2 events about advertisement.
- Worked with fulltime and payment base on hours.
- Report to team leader and PM.
PHP Team Leader - Freelancer
Sunrise Software Solution Corp.– HCM
09/2011 – 11/2011
- Provide technical solution for team.
- Manage team, requirement analysis, research.
- Support PM for managing projects.
IT Manager - Fulltime
Lynk Investment Trading & Service Co., Ltd.– HCM
03/2011 – 09/2011
- Manage IT Department.
- Work as Project Manager for outsourcing projects.
- Manage internal website systems for Ms Ly Nha Ky.
- Report directly to Ms Ky.
PHP Senior Developer - Fulltime
Pyramid Consulting Vietnam – HCM
10/2009 – 03/2011
- Develop PHP projects base on FWs and CMs: Zend, Joomla, Wordpress,
CodeIgniter, NXTM...
- Research and develop web applications with social network: facebook apps,
social network linking.
- Create a Wordpress HTML framework successful and used for HTML team
in doing HTML template
- Be worked in high professional environment.
- Work as Team Leader of projects, support solution for members.
- Report to PMs and Line Manager.
- Developed some important projects of company:
o
ASB: www.airshowbuzz.com (Developed web services for connecting 
between flash and php)
o
NXTM: www.whooznt.com. This project is social network website for 
singers and bands. They can login and link to web by social accounts 
(Facebook, Twitter, MySpace,..). They can post once publish everywhere 
with their message. The website will count fans and twits. And from that, 
we will have ranking table for singers. Scope:  Develop on web and must 
run smooth on all of browsers and touch mobile devices. Just connect and
link with facebook, twitter, myspace, sound cloud.... Payment thought 
Paypal.
o
Mantre Kanter: http://www.taverne-maitre-kanter.fr/ : a Joomla project for 
restaurant. (just lead and manage project)
o
Happy Hour : a Facebook application. It’s a game. User can vote photos 
and win gifts.
o
Heartburn site: http://www.heartburn.com.au/ : a Joomla project for 
business.
o
Web service for Flash sites: use CodeIgniter for implement services, 
connect between flash and php.
o
Vichy site: http://demo3.pyramid-consulting.com/vichy/products/ : a 
business site use CodeIgniter  Framework. It be developed base on my 
CMS.
o
Some single wordpress / mu wordpress projects for business and events.
Bugs Fixer - Freelancer
Le & Associates – HCM
9/2009 – 11/2009
- Fix bugs on Motibee website (base on Joomla CMS).
- Report to Leader.
Project Leader - Fulltime
VN2S – HCM
6/2009 – 9/2009
- Manage .NET web projects, schedule, and teams.
- Support solution and technical for members of project.
- Report to Product Managers.
Project Manager - Fulltime
SpaceGate JSC – HCM
12/2008 – 5/2009
- Build up SP CMS and SP Admin Tool base on Code Igniter Framework.
This system can generate an produce websites base on created modules 
and features. It has been applied for business web development projects.
- Manage web projects, schedule, and teams.
- Support customers and partners.
- Support technical for members of project.
- Report to Software Department Manager.
Technical Team Leader - Fulltime
VC Corporation – HCM
6/2008 – 12/2008
- Research search engines, supply solutions and build up ihoatieu.com 
website base on .Net and PHP language. (Ihoatieu is search engine, it 
can collect job information and display result through search keyword) .
- Develop API web services for connecting of other websites
- Create tools to support for ihoatieu (Filter tool, Cache tool, …). They’re 
window application and developed base on C# Language
- Manage schedule, plan, and members.
- Support and contact customers, partners.
- Report to Product Manager.
PHP Senior Developer / Team Leader - Fulltime
VinaGame Joint Stock Company - HCM
3/2007 – 6/2008
- Research and develop vPortal framework and web applications.
- Lead API web service team.
- Manage project, plan, processing and members of project.
- Interview candidate for PHP positions
- Report to Manager.
QA Team Leader - Freelancer
HiTek Solution Co., Ltd. - HCM
12/2006 – 07/2007
- Manage quality of products, test plan.
- Apply testing process and monitor members.
- Report to manager.
Testing Engineer - Fulltime
LTRC (LogiGear) - HCM
07/2006 - 3/2007
- Work as automation testing, write action scripts on TA tool.
- Report testing result to project leader.
Web Developer & Research Student - Fulltime
HCMC Institute of Information Technology 
(Vietnamese Academy of Science and Technology)
05/2006 - 07/2006
- Research and develop PHP web projects.
- Report to manager.
Software Developer - Fulltime
HiTek Solution Co., LTD - HCM
03/2004 - 04/2006
- Program and develop window applications and web projects. Joined 2 big 
projects: RMS  (Resort Management System) and BMS (Billing 
Management System)
- Research and develop HCMS web system (a Content Management
System).
- Research web technology, control process of web projects.
- Report to manager.
Computerized Accountant and Network Administrator - Fulltime
Duc Lap export hand-made pottery company - Dong Thap
08/2003 - 11/2003
- Work as IT Officer.
Qualification
Education: 2015
PMC Co., Ltd, Vietnam – pmc.edu.vn
Degree: PMF
Major: Project Management
2003
     2   0  06

Major: Software Engineer
- Getting hands on experience from real projects at institute.

- Learning working as group, analysis, report on subjects, 
information searching skill, working order, assigning tasks.
2002
   2

   :

DNIIT

Vietnamese – Native
English – Intermediate
Skills:
+ Team working spirit, problem solving ability, analysis project and 
requirements, control processing of the project, and manage team 
member.
+ Keep track and manage projects.
+ more 9 years experience in developing PHP projects.
+ Worked on large projects and challenges.
+ The current strong tech is Wordpress CMS with more 4 years experience. 
Have correctly knowledge about CMS data and structures. Have completed 2 
training document about Wordpress and Unit Test on Wordpress for some 
courses in Harvey Nash Company
+ Self- researched and succeeded in developing CMS web system (JK 
e- portal, Web generate system). It was deployed for some website in 
2009. Developed the theme standard with support controls and libraries 
for coding on Wordpress CMS from 2013. Also, i’m strong and master for 
Wordpress systems
+ Manage an external group and work as PM offshore for developing 
webs and software out sourcing.

- Application programming: Java, C#.NET, VB.NET, Delphi, Pascal.
- Web programming: PHP, ASP.NET, JSP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Jquery, 
Grunt, Gulp, Node.JS
-  CMS and Framework: Wordpress CMS, Shopify, Drupal 7, Joomla 
CMS, Symphony FW. Zend FW, CodeIgniter FW.
- RDBMS: mySQL, MS SQL, MS Access.
- OS: Windows, MacOS, Linux (basic), Ubuntu (basic), some cloud hosting 
online use CPanel, Direct Admin, WPEngine, Jira, Git, GitHub, BitBucket.
- Others: Zeplin, Atom, Photoshop, COM+, XML, UML, Jenkins Tool, Flash 
(basic), Server & Network Domain (basic), Google Services (GA, GA 
Captcha, GTM,…), AWS Console.
My Expectations
Desired job title:
Principle Software Engineer
Senior PHP Developer
Technical Architect 
Team Leader
Project Manager
Technical Lead
Desired monthly Salary:
1300 USD (NET)
Desired hourly Salary:
~15 USD (NET)
Type of Position Sought:
Full-Time (Permanent) / Freelancer / Part time
Desired work location:
Ho Chi Minh
Desired Categories:
IT – Software
Willing to relocate:
No (but say Yes for oversea works)

65/1B Tan Ky Tan Quy, Tan Son Nhi Ward, Tan Phu District.
